src:
Jadon Sancho Diklaim Bakal Sangat Cocok untuk Liverpool
05 Nov 2019, 08:08 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Bintang muda Borussia Dortmund, Jadon Sancho diklaim akan sangat cocok untuk tim-tim papan atas Premier League, termasuk Liverpool. Hal ini diutarakan oleh eks striker The Reds, Emile Heskey.
Masih berusia 19 tahun, Sancho sudah menjadi andalan di lini depan Dortmund. Keputusannya keluar dari Inggris ketika meninggalkan Manchester City pada 2017 lalu rupanya berbuah manis.
Performa gemilang Sancho berlanjut di musim ini. Dari delapan laga di Bundesliga musim ini, Sancho sudah menyumbang tiga gol dan lima assist.
text:
Jadon Sancho Claimed to be Very Suitable for Liverpool
05 Nov 2019, 08:08 by Bola.net
Soccer - Borussia Dortmund young star Jadon Sancho is claimed to be very suitable for top Premier League teams, including Liverpool. This was stated by the former Reds striker, Emile Heskey.
Still 19 years old, Sancho has become a mainstay in the front line Dortmund. His decision out of England when leaving Manchester City in 2017 was apparently sweet fruit.
Sancho's brilliant performance continues this season. Of the eight games in the Bundesliga this season, Sancho has contributed three goals and five assists.
